column4: hello , will it be possible someday to make an update to a broken system using synaptic or update-manager hmm k stupid apt-get apt-get using  a livecd :-/
whats wrong
I got several problems with Xorg "not saving" and recovering an old config file
I also got problem setting up a Genius pen and table
Chloe can you be a little more descriptive about your xorg problem
ok well I can "pastebin" the current config it's working but if I uncomment some lines it doesn't work anymore
I would need a testparm for Xorg
if I pastebin will you be able to help?
Chloe Sure
thanks fsckd give me a few minutes to gather the informations
Chloe ok and for the tablet you can try https://help.ubuntu.com/community/TabletSetupWizardpen
I am stuck on that howto badly
I go something to investigate about Xorg 7.3 and that driver
Chloe did it work in 7.10 or 7.04

I basically got problem with the tablet but an error that I fixed yesterday in the xorg came back today as if the display server got back to a previous config due to an incorrect shutdown or something
here is my xorg.conf http://paste.ubuntu-fr-secours.org/source-716.html
if I uncomment the tablet part I get to the "default" config screen
Chloe after you edit your xorg.conf did you run a sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg
I am going to try that fsckd thanks
Chloe ok
I ll come back and paste you the Xorg.log if it doesn't owrk
